author: blair
msg: Follow up to r23746.  Fix off by one bugs where '-r URL DIRNAME' with
no revision number would be successfully parsed by the new externals
Ensure that -r has at least a single character following the -r.
Add a third external using '-r1' instead of '-r 1'.  Check it
using the same code that checked '-r 1'.

author: blair
msg: Put a - before each r, so it reads -r, in the documentation.

author: ehu
msg: Fix issue #1962: merge of non-empty subdir committed incorrectly.
(Note from the future: This change was later reverted in r26181.)
schedule of the parent, if any.  Document this is a slight difference
to be used for an entry to be added.  This is the main folding routine.

to eliminate 'Already under version control' errors in
